nodes.long_description:
Train like millions do in gyms worldwide: powerful new punches, knee strikes, and immersive gameplay. Workout at home with the official, most immersive, most innovative version of LES MILLS BODYCOMBAT.

{972283711315200}
🏋️‍♀️ **Workouts for everyone**: Beginner to advanced: 50 workout plans to help you achieve your goals. Real training, real results.

🔥 **Designed for results**: All workouts are scientifically designed to get the best results.

👨‍🏫 **First class coaches**: Let Dan Cohen & Rachael Newsham push, motivate, and transform your training.

🎵 **Epic music & environments**: Move to heart-pumping tracks and train in stunning dreamlike worlds.

✨**Premium  DLCs** (Separate purchase): Unlock exclusive moves, challenging workouts, unique environments & cosmetics.


{521284134082118}
nodes.short_description:
Workout at home with an award-winning fitness app by Odders Lab and Les Mills! Discover the ultimate BODYCOMBAT experience from the world's leading fitness company in your headset, with an extensive workout portfolio, top-quality coaching, innovative mechanics and different intensities.

📅 NEW CHALLENGE PAS
👓 VR & MR AVAILABLE
🏆 BODYCOMBAT STYLE
🏋️‍♀️ FOR EVERYONE
🔥 GET THE RESULTS YOU WANT
👨‍🏫 FIRST CLASS COACHES
🎵 AMAZING MUSIC & ENVIRONMENTS
✨OUTSTANDING DLCS

nodes.long_description:
使用由 Odders Lab 和 Les Mills 开发且屡获殊荣的健身应用程序，在家中锻炼身体！使用耳机，探索世界领先健身公司的终极 BODYCOMBAT 体验，有丰富的锻炼组合、高质量教学、创新机 制和不同强度供您选择

{1083599253565912}


🏋️‍♀️ **适合所有人的锻炼**。从初学者到高级: 50个锻炼计划助你实现目标。

🔥 **为结果而设计**。所有锻炼都经过科学设计, 以获得最佳效果。

👨‍🏫 **一流教练**。让Dan Cohen & Rachael Newsham推动、激励并改变你的训练。

🎵 **史诗音乐与环境**。跟随心跳加速的音乐移动, 在令人惊叹的梦幻世界中训练。

✨**高级DLC** (单独购买). 解锁独家动作、挑战性锻炼、独特环境和装饰。
{569582902319955}

nodes.long_description:
Train comme des millions de personnes dans les salles de sport du monde entier: de nouveaux coups puissants, des frappes de genou et un gameplay immersif. Entraînez-vous à la maison avec la version officielle, la plus immersive et la plus innovante de LES MILLS BODYCOMBAT.

{2118435411885756}

🏋️‍♀️ **Entraînements pour tous**. Débutant à avancé: 50 programmes d’entraînement pour vous aider à atteindre vos objectifs.

🔥 **Conçu pour des résultats**. Tous les entraînements sont scientifiquement conçus pour obtenir les meilleurs résultats.

👨‍🏫 **Coachs de première classe**. Laissez Dan Cohen & Rachael Newsham vous pousser, vous motiver et transformer votre entraînement.

🎵 **Musique et environnements épiques**. Bougez au rythme de morceaux palpitants et entraînez-vous dans des mondes de rêve époustouflants.

✨**DLC Premium** (achat séparé). Débloquez des mouvements exclusifs, des entraînements stimulants, des environnements uniques et des cosmétiques.

{2851127385055256}
nodes.short_description:
Entraînez-vous chez vous avec l'application de fitness primée de Odders Lab et Les Mills !
Découvrez l'expérience BODYCOMBAT ultime du leader mondial du fitness dans votre casque, avec un vaste portefeuille d'entraînements, un coaching de qualité, des mécanismes innovants et différentes intensités.
📅
👓VR et MR DISPONIBLES
🏆STYLE BODYCOMBAT
🏋️‍♀️POUR TOUS
🔥OBTENEZ LES RÉSULTATS QUE VOUS SOUHAITEZ
👨‍🏫AUTOCARS DE PREMIÈRE CLASSE
UNE MUSIQUE ET DES ENVIRONNEMENTS ÉTONNANTS
✨DLCS EXCEPTIONNELS

nodes.long_description:
전 세계 수백만 명이 체육관에서 훈련하는 것처럼: 강력한 새로운 펀치, 니 스트라이크, 그리고 몰입감 넘치는 게임플레이. 집에서 공식적이고 가장 혁신적이며 몰입적인 BODYCOMBAT 버전으로 운동하세요.
{1279096689772660}
🏋️‍♀️ **모두를 위한 운동**. 초급부터 고급까지: 목표 달성을 돕는 50가지 운동 플랜.

🔥 **결과를 위해 설계됨**. 모든 운동은 최고의 결과를 얻도록 과학적으로 설계되었습니다.

👨‍🏫 **일류 코치**. Dan Cohen & Rachael Newsham이 당신을 밀어주고, 동기부여하며, 훈련을 변화시켜 드립니다.

🎵 **에픽 음악 & 환경**. 심장을 뛰게 하는 트랙에 맞춰 움직이고 환상적인 꿈속 세계에서 훈련하세요.

✨**프리미엄 DLC** (별도 구매). 독점 동작, 도전적인 운동, 독특한 환경 및 코스메틱을 잠금 해제하세요.


{943740414319309}
nodes.short_description:
수상 경력에 빛나는 오더스랩과 레밀스의 피트니스 앱으로 집에서 운동하세요! 광범위한 운동
포트폴리오, 최고 수준의 코칭, 혁신적인 메커니즘, 다양한 강도로 세계 최고의 피트니스 회사가
제공하는 궁극의 BODYCOMBAT 경험을 헤드셋에서 만나보세요.

- 바디컴벳 스타일
- 누구에게나 적합
- 원하는 결과 얻기
- 최우수 코치
- 멋진 음악
- 숨 막힐 듯 멋진 환경

nodes.long_description:
Allenati come milioni di persone nelle palestre di tutto il mondo: potenti nuovi pugni, ginocchiate e gameplay immersivo. Allenati a casa con la versione ufficiale, più immersiva e innovativa di LES MILLS BODYCOMBAT.

{1127730458750480}

🏋️‍♀️ **Allenamenti per tutti**. Da principiante ad avanzato: 50 piani di allenamento per aiutarti a raggiungere i tuoi obiettivi.

🔥 **Progettato per risultati**. Tutti gli allenamenti sono scientificamente studiati per ottenere i migliori risultati.

👨‍🏫 **Coach di prima classe**. Lascia che Dan Cohen & Rachael Newsham ti spingano, motivino e trasformino il tuo allenamento.

🎵 **Musica ed ambienti epici**. Muoviti a ritmo di tracce coinvolgenti e allenati in mondi da sogno mozzafiato.

✨**DLC Premium** (acquisto separato). Sblocca mosse esclusive, allenamenti impegnativi, ambienti unici e cosmetici.


{916101170452528}
nodes.short_description:
Allenati a casa con la pluripremiata app di Odders Lab e Les Mills! Scopri l’esperienza BODYCOMBAT più avanzata dell’azienda leader mondiale del fitness nelle tue cuffie, con un’ampia gamma di allenamenti, coaching di alta qualità, meccaniche innovative e diverse
intensità.

📅NUOVO CHALLENGE PASS
👓VR E MR DISPONIBILI
🏆STILE BODYCOMBAT
🏋️‍♀️PER TUTTI
🔥RAGGIUNGI I RISULTATI CHE VUOI
👨‍🏫ALLENATORI DI MASSIMO LIVELLO
🎵MUSICA E AMBIENTI INCREDIBILI
✨DLC STRAORDINARI (acquisto separato).

nodes.long_description:
世界中の数百万人がジムで行っているようにトレーニング: 強力な新しいパンチ、ニー・ストライク、そして没入感あふれるゲームプレイ。公式で最も没入的で革新的なBODYCOMBATバージョンで自宅でワークアウトしましょう。

{837683478270543}

🏋️‍♀️ **誰でもできるワークアウト**。初心者から上級者まで: 目標達成を助ける50のワークアウトプラン。

🔥 **結果のために設計**。すべてのワークアウトは最高の成果を出すよう科学的に設計されています。

👨‍🏫 **一流コーチ**。Dan Cohen & Rachael Newshamがあなたを押し上げ、動機づけ、トレーニングを変革します。

🎵 **壮大な音楽 & 環境**。心を揺さぶるトラックに合わせて動き、夢のように美しい世界でトレーニング。

✨**プレミアムDLC** (別売). 限定の動き、チャレンジングなワークアウト、ユニークな環境&コスメティックをアンロック。

{2473602546178778}
nodes.short_description:
Odders Lab と Les Mills による受賞歴のあるフィットネス アプリを使って自宅でトレーニング しましょう!世界をリードするフィットネス会社が提供する、広範なワークアウト ポートフォ リオ、最高品質のコーチング、革新的なメカニズム、さまざまな強度を備えた究極の
BODYCOMBAT 体験をヘッドセットで体験してください。
📅最新機能のご紹介: 1チャレンジパス!
👓VRとMRが利用可能
🏆ボディコンバットスタイル
🏋️‍♀️みんなのために
🔥望む結果を得る
👨‍🏫一流のコーチ
🎵素晴らしい音楽と環境
✨未処理のDLC （個別購入）

nodes.long_description:
Trainiere wie Millionen weltweit in Fitnessstudios: kraftvolle neue Schläge, Kniestöße und immersives Gameplay. Trainiere zu Hause mit der offiziellen, immersivsten und innovativsten Version von LES MILLS BODYCOMBAT.
{925226892271234}
🏋️‍♀️ **Workouts für alle**. Von Anfänger bis Fortgeschritten: 50 Trainingspläne, die dir helfen, deine Ziele zu erreichen.

🔥 **Für Ergebnisse entwickelt**. Alle Workouts sind wissenschaftlich konzipiert, um die besten Resultate zu erzielen.

👨‍🏫 **Erstklassige Trainer**. Lass dich von Dan Cohen & Rachael Newsham antreiben, motivieren und in deinem Training transformieren.

🎵 **Epische Musik & Umgebungen**. Bewege dich zu mitreißenden Tracks und trainiere in atemberaubenden traumhaften Welten.

✨**Premium-DLCs** (separat erhältlich). Schalte exklusive Moves, herausfordernde Workouts, einzigartige Umgebungen & Kosmetika frei.

nodes.short_description:
Trainieren Sie zu Hause mit einer preisgekrönten Fitness-App von Odders Lab und Les Mills!
Entdecken Sie das ultimative BODYCOMBAT-Erlebnis des weltweit führenden Fitnessunternehmens in Ihrem Headset, mit einem umfassenden Trainings portfolio,erstklassigem Coaching, innovativer Mechanik und unterschiedlichen Intensitäten.

nodes.long_description:
Entrena en casa con la galardonada app de fitness de Odders Lab y Les Mills. Descubre la experiencia BODYCOMBAT de la empresa líder mundial en fitness en tus cascos VR con varios entrenamientos e intenstidades, coaching de primera calidad y mecánicas innovadoras.
{393646117048914}
👓VR Y MR DISPONIBLES

Golpea con fuerza en Realidad Mixta o lanza puñetazos y rodillazos en la VR clásica que ya conoces.

🏆ESTILO BODYCOMBAT

El famoso entrenamiento inspirado en las artes marciales que se practica en miles de gimnasios de todo el mundo está ahora disponible en VR y MR, con nuevos movimientos de puñetazos  y golpes de rodilla.

🏋️‍♀️PARA TODOS

Desde principiantes hasta avanzados: 50 planes de entrenamiento para alcanzar tus metas.

🔥 OBTÉN RESULTADOS

Todos los entrenamientos están diseñados científicamente para obtener los mejores resultados.

👨‍🏫 ENTRENADORES DE PRIMERA

Los famosos instructores Dan Cohen y Rachael Newsham te motivarán en cada entrenamiento.

🎵MÚSICA Y AMBIENTES TOP

La mejor banda sonora para motivarte y entornos de ensueño para inspirarte.

**✨DLCS EXCELENTES (compra por separado)**

Disfruta de movimientos de juego innovadores, entrenamientos desafiantes y entornos y cosméticos exclusivos.


{1105127051050008}
nodes.short_description:
Entrena en casa con la galardonada aplicación de fitness de Odders Lab y Les Mills. Descubre la experiencia BODYCOMBAT definitiva de la empresa líder mundial en fitness en tus cascos VR con una amplia variedad de entrenamientos, un coaching de primera calidad, mecánicas innovadoras y diferentes intensidades.

📅 NUEVO CHALLENGE PASS
👓VR Y MR DISPONIBLES
🏆ESTILO BODYCOMBAT
🏋️‍♀️PARA TODOS
🔥 OBTÉN LOS RESULTADOS QUE DESEAS
👨‍🏫 ENTRENADORES DE PRIMERA CLASE
🎵MÚSICA Y AMBIENTES INCREÍBLES

Entrena como lo hacen millones de personas en gimnasios de todo el mundo: Nuevos y potentes golpes, rodillazos y una jugabilidad completamente inmersiva. Descubre la experiencia BODYCOMBAT de la empresa líder mundial en fitness con múltiples entrenamientos e intenstidades, coaching de primera calidad y resultados reales.

{1095999958632454}

🏋️‍♀️ **Entrenamientos para todos**. De principiante a avanzado: 50 planes de entrenamiento para ayudarte a lograr tus objetivos.

🔥 **Diseñado para resultados**. Todos los entrenamientos están científicamente diseñados para obtener los mejores resultados.

👨‍🏫 **Entrenadores de primera clase**. Deja que Dan Cohen & Rachael Newsham te impulsen, motiven y transformen tu entrenamiento.

🎵 **Música y entornos épicos**. Muévete al ritmo de pistas vibrantes y entrena en impresionantes mundos de ensueño.

✨**DLC Premium** (compra por separado). Desbloquea movimientos exclusivos, entrenamientos desafiantes, entornos únicos y cosméticos.

{487196794332136}

Entrena en casa con la galardonada aplicación de fitness de Odders Lab y Les Mills. Descubre la experiencia BODYCOMBAT definitiva de la empresa líder mundial en fitness en tus cascos VR con una amplia variedad de entrenamientos, un coaching de primera calidad, mecánicas innovadoras y diferentes intensidades.

nodes.long_description:
We’re on a mission to create a fitter planet. Join us.

Work out at home with a premium fitness app. LES MILLS, the world's leading fitness company, brings the BODYCOMBAT experience to your VR headset with an extensive workout portfolio, top-quality coaching, innovative mechanics, and different intensities.

🏆 BODYCOMBAT STYLE
Mixing martial arts and fitness, get an all-access to all types of workouts. New punch moves and knee strikes.

🏋️‍♀️ FOR EVERYONE
Beginner to advanced: 30 workout plans to help you achieve your goals.

🔥 GET THE RESULTS YOU WANT
All workouts are scientifically designed to get the best results.

👨‍🏫 FIRST CLASS COACHES
Instructors Dan Cohen & Rachael Newsham will motivate and push you through every workout.

🎵 AMAZING MUSIC
The best soundtrack to motivate you with songs from artist like Noam Dee, Fas Fash, & more.

⛰️ BREATHTAKING ENVIRONMENTS
5 dreamlike environments for your fitness journey: Mars, Neo City, Rome, Japan, and Tundra, with more to come!
nodes.short_description:
We’re on a mission to create a fitter planet. Join us.

Workout at home with the best fitness app on Quest. Bodycombat brings to VR all the expertise of Les Mills, a leading company in the training sector with unique ideas and innovative mechanics that bring a new dimension to the world of home workouts.

🏆 BODYCOMBAT & MORE
🏋️‍♀️ FOR EVERYONE
🔥 BURN THOSE CALORIES
👨‍🏫 FIRST CLASS COACHES
🎵 AMAZING MUSIC
⛰️ BREATHTAKING ENVIRONMENTS

nodes.change_log:
Community Feedback - Major Update

This update brings smoother gameplay, better performance, enhanced hit detection, a HUGE set of fixes and more, all inspired directly by your feedback. Thanks to our amazing community for helping us keep improving Les Mills XR Bodycombat!

## 🚀 Improvements

### **Improved Hit & Movement Detection**

- Increased hit accuracy margin.
- Reduced false fail detections on correct hits.
- Smoother target movement and improved responsiveness.
- Significantly fewer freezes and performance dips during sessions.
- Improved detection for **elbow** and **knee** movements.
- Better detection for targets placed very close together.

### **Better Intro Session Videos**

- Reduced video stuttering and performance drops during intro sequences.
- Overall playback is now smoother and more consistent.

### **Enhanced Streak & Weekly Goals Explanation**

- Added clearer, more helpful text explaining how streaks and weekly goals work.
- Available in both **Home** and **My Training** sections.

### **UI & UX Enhancements**

- The **Retry** button has been restored in the disconnection popup.

---

## 🐛 **Bug Fixes**

### 🎮 **Gameplay & Scoring**

- The blue target now grants the correct performance score.
- Repeated end-of-session audio during the Bonus Round has been fixed.
- Rival scores now correctly account for score modifiers in multiplier sessions.
- Avatars no longer start gameplay slowed down.
- Launching a warmup no longer prevents elbow/knee tutorials from triggering.

### 🎥 **Visual & Rendering Issues**

- Fixed clipping between long wall shadows and the platform center.
- Corrected rendering issues when targets explode.
- Fixed an issue where more than three walls rendered simultaneously.
- Ghost Mode profile picture now displays correctly.
- Fixed black borders appearing on the pause menu.
- Resolved visual glitch in Navbar when switching between VR and MR.
- Corrected persistent leaderboard shadow during onboarding tutorials.
- Fixed “Missing local” visual error in Cover K.O. 5.

### 🖥️ **UI & Navigation**

- Fixed reconnection popup loop after losing connection during profile creation.
- Main menu window shadows no longer persist.
- User search now correctly enforces the 14-character limit.
- Fixed incorrect “30 goals / 30 best streak” values in My Training after a disconnection.
- Errors in Lower Body Conditioning sessions have been fixed.

### 🎧 **Onboarding**

- Pausing before Dan’s onboarding video no longer causes audio-only playback.
- New profiles no longer start at Level 0 and immediately jump to Level 1.

This update brings smoother gameplay, better performance, enhanced hit detection, a HUGE set of fixes and more, all inspired directly by your feedback. Thanks to our amazing community for helping us keep improving Les Mills XR Bodycombat!

IMPROVEMENTS
Improved Hit & Movement Detection
- Increased hit accuracy margin.
- Reduced false fail detections on correct hits.
- Smoother target movement and improved responsiveness.
- Significantly fewer freezes and performance dips during sessions.
- Improved detection for elbow and knee movements.
- Better detection for targets placed very close together.

Better Intro Session Videos
- Reduced video stuttering and performance drops during intro sequences.
- Overall playback is now smoother and more consistent.

Enhanced Streak & Weekly Goals Explanation
- Added clearer, more helpful text explaining how streaks and weekly goals work.
- Available in both Home and My Training sections.

UI & UX Enhancements
- The Retry button has been restored in the disconnection popup.


BUG FIXES
Gameplay & Scoring
- The blue target now grants the correct performance score.
- Repeated end-of-session audio during the Bonus Round has been fixed.
- Rival scores now correctly account for score modifiers in multiplier sessions.
- Avatars no longer start gameplay slowed down.
- Launching a warmup no longer prevents elbow and knee tutorials from triggering.

Visual & Rendering Issues
- Fixed clipping between long wall shadows and the platform center.
- Corrected rendering issues when targets explode.
- Fixed an issue where more than three walls rendered simultaneously.
- Ghost Mode profile picture now displays correctly.
- Fixed black borders appearing on the pause menu.
- Resolved visual glitch in the Navbar when switching between VR and MR.
- Corrected persistent leaderboard shadow during onboarding tutorials.
- Fixed "Missing local" visual error in Cover K.O. 5.

UI & Navigation
- Fixed reconnection popup loop after losing connection during profile creation.
- Main menu window shadows no longer persist.
- User search now correctly enforces the 14-character limit.
- Fixed incorrect "30 goals / 30 best streak" values in My Training after a disconnection.
- Errors in Lower Body Conditioning sessions have been fixed.

Onboarding
- Pausing before Dan’s onboarding video no longer causes audio-only playback.
- New profiles no longer start at Level 0 and immediately jump to Level 1.
